items.summary: Update the Hub page to support grouped browsing by game category: when viewing "All Categories", render games grouped into distinct category sections (one section per `game.category`) with a clear category heading and per-section game list/grid; keep existing search behavior and ensure category grouping updates dynamically based on the current search query.

When a specific category is selected in the existing category filter (not "all"), render a single category section for that category (or a single ungrouped list) while preserving the existing game-card UI, play/coming-soon behavior, and result count messaging.
